title: Implement Rogers-Satchell Volatility
body:
<!--- This template provides sections for bugs and features. Please delete any irrelevant sections before submitting -->

#### Expected Behavior
Supports Rogers-Satchell Volatility (see [description](https://portfolioslab.com/tools/rogers-satchell) and [talipp implementation](https://github.com/nardew/talipp/blob/main/talipp/indicators/RogersSatchell.py))

Refer to [LEAN Engine > Contributions > Indicators](https://www.quantconnect.com/docs/v2/lean-engine/contributions/indicators).

#### Checklist
<!--- Confirm that you've provided all the required information. -->
<!--- Required fields --->
- [x] I have completely filled out this template
- [x] I have confirmed that this issue exists on the current `master` branch
- [x] I have confirmed that this is not a duplicate issue by searching [issues](https://github.com/QuantConnect/Lean/issues)
<!--- Required for Bugs, feature request can delete the line below. -->
- [x] I have provided detailed steps to reproduce the issue
